headline: Texas Pacific Land Corporation Completes Inaugural $500 Million Credit Facility
summary: DALLAS, October 27, 2025--Texas Pacific Land Corporation (NYSE: TPL)("TPL" or the "Company") today announced the completion of a new $500 million revolving credit facility (the "Credit Facility"). The Credit Facility was substantially oversubscribed with strong support from twelve financial institutions.
